title: DisconnectuBlock
extract: uBlock is the ideal ad blocker for stopping unwanted ads and speeding up your browsing experience. ... If you're looking for an ad blocker to remove ads from your Internet experience and help improve your overall online security, then uBlock is the tool for you.4 days ago
